H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H2232.def: = action by which humans scatter seeds or plant young plants in a field so that they may grow into a new crop; ≈ associated with the concept of investing in order to get a return; also associated with reproduction and perpetuation

H2145.def: = person or animal belonging to the male sex

H2930.def: = process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures

H7651.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5079.def: = state in which humans are considered unclean because of a flow of blood or contact with a corpse

H1738.def: = process by which a female discharges blood and other material from the lining of the uterus at intervals of about one lunar month; ≈ regarded as a cause of ritual uncleanness

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H1320.def: = the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

H4135.def: = action by which someone removes the foreskin of the penis, + preferably with a {L:flint<SDBH:צֹר>} knife, as a sign of the covenant between YHWH and Abraham's descendants; ≈ considered an outward change for the good that should be accompanied by an inward change in attitude as well

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H2893.def: = process by which people become free from contamination, ► as a result of which they can interact socially with others

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H7970.def: = state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5060.def: = process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, whether deliberately or not

H6944.def: = state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well

H4720.def: = part of an object that is considered more holy than the rest

H5704.def: particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H5347.def: = person or animal belonging to the female sex

H2930.def: = process by which humans, or objects are or become contaminated, ◄ as a result of contagious diseases or conditions, unlawful activities, or contact with what has been contaminated, ► which often results in their inability of being used or participating in social and religious activities, until this state is reversed through prescribed rituals and procedures

H7620.def: = the cycle of seven days from the first day to the seventh, which is the {L:sabbath<SDBH:שַׁבָּת>}

H5079.def: = state in which humans are considered unclean because of a flow of blood or contact with a corpse

H3427.def: = action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

H2893.def: = process by which people become free from contamination, ► as a result of which they can interact socially with others

H8346.def: = state in which a countable entity is the sixth in a range

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H8337.def: = state in which a countable entity is six in number

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H2893.def: = process by which people become free from contamination, ► as a result of which they can interact socially with others

H4390.def: = state or process in which a certain location, container, or surface is filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left

H176.def: = particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H3548.def: = person {L:ordained<SDBH:מלא>} and {L:consecrated<SDBH:קדשׁ>} to perform religious services on behalf of others

H6607.def: literally: opening up of words; hence: = causative process by which deities make words easier to understand

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H4150.def: = an action by which two or more parties come together for a particular purpose

H3532.def: = young of a sheep, either male or female; ► eaten at Passover, and used for sacrifice; its fleece is used for clothing

H3123.def: = a bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives  in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

H8449.def: = a bird with a blue-gray color with a pinkish sheen to the neck feathers and a black tip on its tail; lives  in large colonies and eats mainly seeds; courts, mates, and has nests several times a year; nests on rock ledges; ◄ |iColumba livia|i*; ► used as food and for sacrifices; ≈ regarded as swift, docile, and innocent, but also as silly and senseless; associated with affection, fertility and sexuality because of its mating habits; the moaning sound this bird sometimes makes is associated with pain and suffering

H7126.def: = action by which humans or animals move to a location relatively close to the location in focus

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3722.def: = causative action by which humans cover objects with a coating of a certain substance

H2891.def: = process by which an area or object becomes free from dirt, contamination and everything else that is not supposed to be present

H4726.def: = an opening in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it; ≈ its water is regarded as a source of life and well-being

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H8451.def: = causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

H2145.def: = person or animal belonging to the male sex

H176.def: = particle linking two entities by which X and Y are alternative options that exclude each other

H5347.def: = person or animal belonging to the female sex

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H1767.def: = state of being sufficient in quantity for a given purpose

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H7716.def: = an individual member of a group of {L:sheep<SDBH:כֶּבֶשׂ>} and {L:goats<SDBH:עֵז>} traveling and feeding together

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number
